main event: A round, white light was observed in the sky over New York, NY for over 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object exhibited erratic and violently erratic movements, arching downward and appearing to disintegrate.
The object had a tail and emitted flashes of red and blue light.
An aircraft was also observed in the area during the sighting.
The sighting occurred at dusk, and the observer was part of the Ground Observer Corps.
The observer was certain of the time and date of the sighting.
sighted object: A round, white light with a tail that exhibited erratic movements
